participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Maya enjoys expressing herself through her baking and music. She is also reflective and seeks to improve her mental health.
participant_1.background: I have a van that has a lot of room for my cooking supplies and equipment, and for when I'm traveling. I work from home doing various jobs on the internet. I am chubby. I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health. I'm learning to play the guitar.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Warm-hearted and resilient, Liam finds comfort in his pets and creative outlets. He is focused on self-improvement after a tough life change.
participant_2.background: I am proud of my two dogs and the love they bring to my life. I love to sew. My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce. I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday. I help around with bookkeeping and tours.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What have you been up to today?
I've been doing some sewing, and I'm trying to figure out what I want to do for my next project.
That's awesome! I love sewing. What are you sewing right now?
I'm making some pillows for my couch. I'm not sure what I want to do next, though. I'm thinking about making some curtains or a dress.
Those all sound like great projects! I'm sure you'll make something amazing.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play with my dogs. I also enjoy going on hikes and taking pictures.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read, write, and play with my cats. I also like to go for walks and bike rides.
Nice! We should get together and do something sometime.
That would be fun! Let's exchange numbers and we can figure something out.
